Class BaseAdapter<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.widget.BaseAdapter
      • r2b.apps.base.BaseAdapter<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - The item type of the list.
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    Adapter, ListAdapter, SpinnerAdapter

extends BaseAdapter
